result.arabic_text: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرۡنَٰهَا مِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ
result.translation: Ni ho Twebwe Allah, Twategeka Luutwi n’umuryango wiwe kuva muri nya gisagara, Turaheza Tubarokora mu bihano vyari bigiye gushika, kiretse umugore wiwe yahonejwe mu bandi kuko yashigikira ingeso zabo mbi.
